bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry jing jing 荊莖：其洗 灼瘡及熱焱瘡，有效 , “Effective if used to rinse sores resulting from scorch ing and sores resulting from heat and flames”. Zhuo lan 灼爛 , festering because of scorching [1] Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry jing jing 荊莖：療 灼爛 , “Heals festering because of scorching ”.
